module.title: Forms & Media
module.description: Build interactive forms and embed media content

lessons.title: Form Elements
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `<form>` wraps form elements
- `<input>` for text fields, `<textarea>` for multi-line
- `<label>` links to inputs via `for`/`htmlFor`
- `<button type="submit">` submits the form
- `<select>` + `<option>` for dropdowns

---

# Form Elements
lessons.codeExample:
<form>
  <label htmlFor="email">Email:</label>
  <input type="email" id="email" placeholder="you@example.com" />
  
  <label htmlFor="message">Message:</label>
  <textarea id="message" rows="4"></textarea>
  
  <button type="submit">Send</button>
</form>

lessons.title: Input Types
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `text`, `email`, `password`, `number`, `tel`, `url`
- `checkbox`, `radio` for selections
- `date`, `time`, `color`, `range` for specialized input
- `required`, `minlength`, `pattern` for validation

---

# Input Types
lessons.codeExample:
<input type="text" placeholder="Your name" />
<input type="email" required />
<input type="password" minLength="8" />
<input type="number" min="0" max="100" />
<input type="date" />
<input type="checkbox" /> Remember me
<input type="range" min="0" max="100" />

lessons.title: Media Elements
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `<video>` embeds video with `controls` attribute
- `<audio>` embeds audio
- `<iframe>` embeds external content (YouTube, maps)
- `<figure>` + `<figcaption>` for media with captions

---

lessons.title: Tables
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `<table>` wraps the table
- `<thead>`, `<tbody>`, `<tfoot>` for sections
- `<tr>` for rows, `<th>` for headers, `<td>` for data
- Use tables for tabular data, not layout
